94 ‘Operation Dirtbag’ sees over 150 illegal migrant sexual predators nabbed in Florida, Kristi Noem announces (nypost.com) 🔥🗑️ ️ GARBAGE PEOPLE  🗑️🔥 posted 6 hours ago by DingleBalls 0 comments award share report block 'Operation Dirtbag' sees over 150 illegal migrant sexual predators nabbed in Florida: DHS The sex offenders were among more than 230 illegals recently rounded up in Florida for a variety of crimes, including numerous drug offenses and even murder, the DHS said. nypost.com
